name: Who Needs Heroes?
description:
A MOBA without Heroes/Champions.  For Game Maker's Toolkit Jam 2018.

Creeps spawn from each side.  You get gold when your creeps or towers kill their creeps or towers.

Use that gold to buy upgrades for your creeps.  Overpower the Red Orc army forces and defend your Ancient!

Controls:

WASD/Arrow keys to move camera.  Mouse for selecting upgrade.
